mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.role_code, r.role_name, r.description, r.status, r.create_time, r.update_time FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY r.create_time DESC

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.name, u.gender, u.phone, u.email, u.department_id, d.department_name, u.user_type, u.status, u.create_time, u.update_time FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON u.department_id = d.id WHERE ur.role_id = #{roleId} AND u.status = 1 ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
